item.title: Kata: Reverse Polish Notation in java
item.description: I’ve written a RPN string calculator in java, using TDD with these: mockito, hamcrest, junit It’s close to the String Calculator kata, by Roy Osherove. This RPN is using mocks (so more difficult than the String calculator) I’ve tried to practice “Your tests are dragging you down” by J.B Rainsberger (mainly, to use something to write on). This behavior is also explained in the book Dirigido por tests (Spanish) by Carlos Blé.
